named-query.name: StudentSubject.findAllStudentRatingsForStudent
named-query.query: SELECT ss FROM StudentSubject ss JOIN FETCH ss.student JOIN FETCH ss.subject WHERE ss.student.id = :idStudent

named-query.name: StudentSubject.findSubjectStudent
named-query.query: SELECT ss FROM StudentSubject ss WHERE ss.student.id = :idStudent AND ss.subject.id = :idSubject
